channel.title: Frost blades 737 - Simply the best! [Adventure logs, Grand Exchange, HighScores,
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://frostblades.org/img/global/logos/realscape.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QdOe3.png[/img][b][url=http://frostblades.org/m=create/] Register[/url][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QdOe3.png[/img][b][url=http://frostblades.org/m=play/] Play Now[/url][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QoTtc.gif[/img][b][url=http://frostblades.org/m=hiscore/] Hiscores[/url][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/aq866.png[/img][b][url=http://frostblades.org/m=forum/forums.php] Community[/url][/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/aq866.png[/img][b][url=http://frostblades.org/m=adventurers-log/] Adventurer's Logs [/url][/b] (not 100% finished yet, but will be soon)
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/I3H5Dx.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[COLOR=blue]Looking to play a dedicated server that updates often with many many features running 24/7 stands out of the crowd with a billion features? look no further! We bring you Frost blades, a dedicated server which runs 24/7 with no lag, we are a Matrix based server, we have many many features, a good economy, we update daily and never fail to impress.[/Color]
[COLOR=red]If there's something we don't have and you'd like to see, just let us know.[/color]
[COLOR=red][SIZE=4]You MUST register to play, click [URL=http://frostblades.org/m=create/]HERE[/URL] to register[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Features:[/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]Frost blades server:[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]- We are currently 718 Loading 737! We are a brand new Economically based server, We have thousands of features, a 'perfect' pvp system, Loyalty programme, and much more![/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]PvP/Pking:[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- We have a PERFECTED Pvp sysem - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking - Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds) - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]PvM: [/COLOR][COLOR=green]- King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon) - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows - All other God-wars bosses! - Duel arena - Castle Wars[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]PvP And PvM:[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue][SIZE=5]Grand Exchange[/SIZE][/COLOR] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TQxDpZD5_78]Frost blades RSPS - Grand Exchange - YouTube[/url] [COLOR=blue]- MySql Database - Saves offers on logout - like RuneScape - Able to exchange offers when one player is offline, e.g have different timezone trading - like RuneScape - Fixed prices for every item - like RuneScape[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red][SIZE=5]Highscores[/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=blue]- Can Search a player on the search box - Like RuneScape - Works for EVERY skills - like RuneScape - Can compare your skills with other players skills - Bringing minigames to it soon, like Duel Arena rating[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Skills:[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Attack - Strength - Defence - Ranged - Magic - RuneCrafting - Construction - Player Owned Houses - Dungeoneering - Proper Tokens system and a shop! - Constitution - Agility - Herblore - Thieving - Crafting - Fletching - Slayer - Hunter - Mining - Smithing - Fishing - Cooking - FireMaking - WoodCutting[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Farming[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Summoning[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Monsters:[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- TzTok-Jad - Haar'Aken - WildyWyem - Ice Strykewyrm - Glacors - Kalphite Queen - Kree'Arra - Nex - General Graardor - Commander Zilyana - K'ril Tsutsaroth - Frost Dragons - King Black Dragon - Dagannoth Kings - Corporeal Beast - Tormented Deamons[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Queen Black Dragon [/color]
[COLOR=blue]Minigames:[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Barrows - Castle Wars - Combat Titans (Custom minigame) - Dominion Tower - Duel Arena - Fight Kiln - Bounty Hunter (2009 Version) - Fight Pits - The Crusible - Warriors guild - Soul Wars - Tzhaar Fight Caves - Fight Pits[/COLOR] [COLOR=yellow]- Pest Control -Fist of Guthix[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Clan Wars[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Others:[/COLOR] [COLOR=green] - Grave Stones - Frost points - Points you can use to buy items, can be obtained through various activities on the server. - More Auras - Decanting - Fixed Shops - Flasks - Potions with 6 Doses. - Bones-on-Altar - Effigies - Full Quick Chat - All Spells in the ancients Spell book - Trading - Dicing - Curses & Prayers - Perfect combat, 100% flawless - Armour set effects all added - Flawless Music & Sound system - Full Completionists cape[/COLOR]
[COLOR=blue]Quests:[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]- Lost City - Doric's Quest - Imp Catcher - Cooks Assistant[/COLOR] - Nomad's Requiem
Other Credits: The Matix Team
[Spoiler=Other Media] Monsters [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U4ErY.png[/img] - Queen black Dragon [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6mruI.png[/img] - Tormented Deamons [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zcQPm.jpg[/img] - Corporeal Beast [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ONvDY.jpg[/img] - Frost Dragons [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8OQkw.jpg[/img] - Ganodermic Beast [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/peKBh.jpg[/img] - Giant Mole [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kmeEx.jpg[/img] - WildyWyrm [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8D5PZ.jpg[/img] - Armadyl [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6VYi4.jpg[/img] - Bandos [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6KFgk.jpg[/img] - Sara [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Blf7H.jpg[/img] - Zammy [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nI15x.jpg[/img] - Nex [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/K75JU.jpg[/img] - KBD
Skills: [img]http://i.imgur.com/OFVVq.jpg[/img] - Farming [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S2RHg.jpg[/img] - Gem Mining [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VTvwF.jpg[/img] - Construction [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lTua7.jpg[/img] - Saw Mill [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7rEtf.jpg[/img] - Fishing Guild [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Y4Qmf.jpg[/img] - Dungeoneering [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qC24g.jpg[/img] - Hunter [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kGZhA.jpg[/img] - Prayer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hkdQ5.jpg[/img] - Slayer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/h251F.jpg[/img] - Thieving
[/spoiler]
[Spoiler=Minigames Media] Minigames: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EtFCy.jpg[/img] - Crusible [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/twEvc.jpg[/img] - Fight Pits [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kaQfU.png[/img] - Fight Kiln [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HkeHq.png[/img] - Barrows [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/M2VKz.jpg[/img] - Soul Wars [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6uEKJ.jpg[/img] - Dominion Tower [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PTHU4.jpg[/img] - Gamers grotto [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VoGEG.jpg[/img] - Sorcerer's garden [/spoiler][spoiler=Other cool stuff]
Misc: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2MyJL.jpg[/img] - Grand Exchange [img]http://i.imgur.com/hGyo8.jpg[/img] - Graves [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kCWlz.png[/img] - Squeal of Fortune [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sgWMe.jpg[/img] - Character customisation [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2wLrH.jpg[/img] - Change name (looks good) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Hj7ub.png[/img] - Select Style (login) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XviNV.png[/img] - General players talking [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NPPC7.jpg[/img] - Skill capes [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9rvpJ.jpg[/img] - Varrock [/spoiler] [spoiler=Website media(You'll like this)] Main Page: [img]http://i.imgur.com/1D4Fk.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zhQEX.jpg[/img] - Logins - Player count - Account Creation
Adventure logs: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NsN5q.jpg[/img]
Forums: [img]http://i.imgur.com/qAW5n.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/me7ed.jpg[/img] - 100% Operational forums
HighScores: [img]http://i.imgur.com/hCGVa.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dWq0T.jpg[/img] - 100% Operational HighScores
Account Settings: [img]http://i.imgur.com/LLVI1.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8vN9h.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BGLzI.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sfdOB.jpg[/img] - Logins - Change Password - Ban meter - Display Names - Change Forum Picture [/spoiler]

item.title: Frost blades 737 - Simply the best! [Adventure logs, Grand Exchange, HighScores,
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“OwnerViper, post:15, topic:465077”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=569552.msg4132294#msg4132294 date=1351258770]

Site is absolutely revolting. Too much going on for it to be remotely appealing; don’t use someone else idea unless you’re creating a remake.

Off-topic: RS is on 737 now?!

I’m not making a re-make, only using the best features of RuneScape to make my private server, every private server is a remake in a way… :faceplam:, yes RS is 737.

No they aren’t. Take a look at the server I’m currently working on, http://www.embattled.org everything is redone in a custom form and nothing is identical to RuneScape so that has no ties to anything remake related.

I love the the website its exactly like RuneScape, never seen that before, good luck with this

The Web Guy released one that either was that or almost the exact same.
[/quote]

You may be an exception, but generally speaking… >.<
Your RSPS is still an RSPS, RSPS is a remake of RuneScape but edited, to your favour… So it IS a remake.

Not going to argue with you on this…[/quote]

That’s not what a remake is.

P.S. They’ll be coming after you for that Site most likely.

Read full topic
